text: Kohlberg is a former municipality in the district of Südoststeiermark in the Austrian state of Styria. Since the 2015 Styria municipal structural reform, it is divided between the municipalities Paldau and Gnas.Die neue Gemeindestruktur der Steiermark ==Population== ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Südoststeiermark District
title: Kohlberg, Styria
